title: Ticket #4831: Allow parens in DAGMan script arguments
description:
Karen just pointed out that the use of parentheses is inconsistent between VARS and pre/post script arguments:
  • VARS is $(JOB) (parens required)
  • Scripts are $JOB (parens not allowed)

I'm proposing that well allow (but not require) parens in pre/post script arguments, so that users can be consistent.

I think we should also allow something like this: 

  $(JOB)foo

in script arguments (this already works in VARS).
